/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A few cars and motorcycles are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees and bushes standing out against the blue of the sky.
